name: Doki Doki Sugar
description:
Zelda like game, you can only have one item at the time.
Developed for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019YOU WIN IF YOU REACH THE ROOM WITH ONE HEART (IT´S A PROTOTYPE)
  • Move: arrows or WASD
  • Grab Item: Space
  • UseItem: Space
  • Drop Item: Left Shift
Developed by: BardackX & AkariUn
